thoughts.text: I found some online communities and forums where I can ask for recommendations on language learning resources. I think it would be helpful to ask for recommendations and see which resource is the best fit for me.
thoughts.reasoning: By asking for recommendations from people who have used these resources before, I can get a better idea of which resource is the best fit for me. This will help me make a more informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Join the online communities and forums
- Ask for recommendations from people who have used these resources before
- Analyze the recommendations to make an informed decision
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on recommendations from others. It's important to also try out the language learning resource myself and see if it works well for me.
